artist: David Roberts, Louis Haghe, Sir Francis Graham Moon
inscription:
BR, withing image: PETRA / March 8th, 1839 ;
circled 1 in graphite at TRC margin
markings: printed BC margin: Published by F.G. Moon. 20 Threadneedle St. July 1st 1842. / PETRA, SHEWING THE UPPER OR EASTERN END OF THE VALLEY.
portfolio: The Holy Land, Syria, Idumea, Arabia, Egypt & Nubia. Volume 3, plate 96
title: Petra, Shewing the Upper or Eastern End of the Valley
